title: Audit Fleet Vehicle Usage
description: An operational auditor reviews the usage of the company's fleet of service vehicles to identify potential misuse or inefficiency.

tasks.description: Obtain and analyze GPS tracking data and fuel card usage data for all fleet vehicles for the past 3 months.
tasks.expected_outcome: Auditor has the complete dataset for analysis.

tasks.description: Analyze the data to identify vehicles with excessive idle times, off-hours usage, or significant deviations from their service routes.
tasks.expected_outcome: The analysis flags 5 vehicles with significant weekend usage.

tasks.description: Recommend stronger controls over vehicle usage, such as a clearer policy on personal use and geofencing alerts.
tasks.expected_outcome: The auditor proposes specific recommendations to reduce misuse.
